AD_ScoutsRetreat.synopsis: The Tadpoled Skeleton Scouts spot the player and give them a brief warning before noticing the Shadowquake and running
AD_ScoutsRetreat.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the skeletons while unavailable to talk (exception made for Silenced players)

Scouts.synopsis: Player meets the skeletons controlled by Balthazar, the Necromancer, who is barricaded elsewhere in the temple. His skeletons meet the player in the hallway. The skeletons sense an attack and retreat to help defend the necromancer.The skeletons speak individually, in turns, but are all the mouthpieces of Balthazar, the necromancer. NOTE: the three skeletal voices/speakers can differ, but should flow in terms of tone as though they're ultimately coming from the one person - transmitting his words.
Scouts.how_to_trigger: Approach the trio of skeletons near X:-717 Y:798

PAD_OnTurn.synopsis: Shadowheart expresses some conflicting feelings about fighting against the temple's defenders.
PAD_OnTurn.how_to_trigger: 1. goto -724; 8; -7972. Talk to skeletons3. Wait for Shadowheart's turn.

AD_ScoutsRetreat_0.text: You tread where you are not wanted - leave.
AD_ScoutsRetreat_0.context: NodeContext: Raspy, undead. Warning off an exploring player

AD_ScoutsRetreat_1.context: NodeContext: Raspy, undead. Alarm, supernaturally sensing danger (in the broader region of a large underground temple rather than right before them)

Scouts_2.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

Scouts_4.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

Scouts_19.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_19.text: Your animal flesh does not fool me. You do not belong here.
Scouts_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

Scouts_3.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_3.text: Yet the Absolute has blessed you. Perhaps you will be useful. Present yourself at my camp and -
Scouts_3.context: NodeContext: Judging the player, recognising they may be a useful pawn. Thought is interrupted at the end as the skeleton senses something (end of sentence would have been 'I will judge your usefulness')

Scouts_11.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_11.text: - stupid, worm-infested cockhead! You have awoken the shadows!
Scouts_11.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A low rumbling sound shudders through the temple. Camera focuses on Skeleton 002, who turns its head, reacting to the noise before speaking with sudden anger and alarm.
Please reduce the transitioning into and out of line. The Skelton should appear as if subtly breathing in life. He's currently feeling like robot batteries running out.  Keep delivery closer to S_SHA_TadpoledSkeletons_Skelly_000.NodeContext: Sudden anger and alarm - we've alerted a dark presence

Scouts_54.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

Scouts_25.speaker: Narrator
Scouts_25.text: *Your mind upends. Somehow, in the decayed soup of this creature's brain, a tadpole lives. Another presence nurtures it, manipulates it like a puppet.*

Scouts_52.speaker: Shadowheart
Scouts_52.text: No - you do not belong. This is the Dark Lady's house. She has no use for old, faithless bones.

Scouts_43.speaker: Shadowheart
Scouts_43.text: And you do? I won't allow some walking, talking feast for stray dogs where I belong or not.

Scouts_35.speaker: Player
Scouts_35.text: Z'rell sent me. I'm here to help a certain Balthazar.
Scouts_35.context: InternalNodeContext: This question if the player received a quest from Z'rell to go find Balthazar.

Scouts_20.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_20.text: I see she sent the husk of Minthara to accompany you.
Scouts_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: contemptuous

Scouts_57.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Contemptuous towards the mention of Z'rell

Scouts_22.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_22.text: Z'rell lacks in many ways, but I do not. Leave, before -
Scouts_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Breaks off before finishing sentence - sensing something. Full sentence would have been 'before you attract trouble'

Scouts_16.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
Scouts_16.text: Rally on me - a wall of bone and blade against the darkness. Now!
Scouts_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking). Addressed to other skeletons.NodeContext: Addressing the other skeletons - transmitting the orders of their master.

Scouts_13.speaker: Player
Scouts_13.text: Three corpses sharing one personality. Who - or what - am I speaking to?

Scouts_44.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_44.text: Your pet drow, Minthara, should recognise me. I'm her superior after all. As for these creatures.

Scouts_48.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_48.text: I am their creator. I saved them from life.
Scouts_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Hint of pride

Scouts_42.text: From their skin and their flesh. Now they serve me. Leave, before -

Scouts_49.speaker: Player
Scouts_49.text: You leave. I don't answer to bone piles.

Scouts_30.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
Scouts_30.text: Bones? They are more than bones.
Scouts_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Hint of pride and indignation

Scouts_60.speaker: Player
Scouts_60.text: I've heard of making instruments out of bones but this is just ridiculous.

PAD_OnTurn_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_OnTurn_0.text: Why do Lady Shar's dead attack? Am I being tested...?
PAD_OnTurn_0.context: NodeContext: Conflicted. Spectres allied to Shar are attacking her in a Shar temple.
